alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 30 at 1:29AM PDT until May 01 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Arizona, southeast California, and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 11 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and result in brief power outages, driving may become hazardous for high profile vehicles, and periods of blowing dust could occur.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
